title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
g place in a defiled chapel beneath Cazador's palace before turning to mist and disappearing.

When you are ready, you can make your way to the Szar Palace in the Lower City.

Szarr Palace, Lower City

The entrance to the Szarr Palace South Tower is located near the Lower City waypoint. (X:-68; Y:-53.) You may need to progress through some main quests to gain access to the Lower City. This involves the quests: Investigate the Selunite Resistance and Solve the Open Hand Temple Murders, or Investi
